thread.title: Shaquil Barrett will start for Broncos if DeMarcus Ware is out
thread.title_full: Shaquil Barrett will start for Broncos if DeMarcus Ware is out - The Denver Post

author: Troy E. Renck
title: Shaquil Barrett will start for Broncos if DeMarcus Ware is out
text:
Broncos coach Gary Kubiak said Thursday edge rusher Shaquil Barrett will start Sunday if DeMarcus Ware can't play because of a back injury.
Kubiak made it seem unlikely Ware would be ready to go at Cleveland.
"DeMarcus has looked good the past two days, but he would have to take a big step (to play Sunday)," Kubiak said. "If he can't Shaq, has earned the right to play more."
Barrett, a former star at Colorado State, has gone from practice squader last year to an impact player. It began with an arduous workout routine in the offseason and carried over into training camp. Barrett led the team in preseason in sacks and has made big plays in wins over the Lions and Raiders.
No official decision has been made on Ware's status. He hasn't practiced this week after suffering back spasms against the Raiders. He told The Post on Wednesday that he will listen to the training staff regarding his status. If Ware can't go, it would give him two weeks rest with the upcoming bye after the Cleveland game.
